sentences.sentence: He had a chance to confess and expiate his guilt.
sentences.translation: 他有认错和赎罪的机会。

sentences.sentence: He hoped to expiate his guilt.
sentences.translation: 他希望为他的过失赎罪。

sentences.sentence: Now i was to expiate all my offences at the gallows.
sentences.translation: 现在我将在绞刑架上赎我一切的罪过。
